column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were starving so we ordered an app sampler while we were waiting for the pizza. The appetizers are huge
column2: so if you are hungry you might want to pace yourself. The dip platter was good
column3: but could have fed 6 people. The calamari was good as well
column4: but Â also a giant portion. We ordered way too much. The pizza was really good. Super heavy on the cheese and with extra sauce. The only thing that I didn't care for was the way that they do their sausage. It is more like a patty that covers the entire pizza and is then covered in sauce. All in all
column5: we had our deep dish experience. They have a bar as well there which was mildly busy. I was satisfied with the experience and can say that I have had Chicago pizza now. Host staff and wait staff were pleasant.
